availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George H. Hord (Woodford County, clerk and paymaster)

body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, clerk and paymaster. Virginia native. Clerk in Woodford County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Woodford County in 1860. Served in the Kentucky State Militia as paymaster in Woodford County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, District 2, p. 461A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Versailles, p. 825.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Versailles, p. 517B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Midway, p. 340B.
KYR-0001-025-0071.
